snippet: State Senator Chris McDaniel filed a formal challenge on Monday to the outcome of the Republican United States Senate primary, citing evidence he said would show “a pattern of conduct” resulting in an improper victory for his rival, Senator Thad...
abstract: Mississippi State Senator Chris McDaniel files formal challenge to outcome of Republican United States Senate primary, arguing that thousands of votes in June runoff were invalid, resulting in improper victory for his rival Sen Thad Cochran.
lead_paragraph: State Senator Chris McDaniel filed a formal challenge on Monday to the outcome of the Republican United States Senate primary, citing evidence he said would show “a pattern of conduct” resulting in an improper victory for his rival, Senator Thad Cochran.
